rooms.description: A grand entrance with polished stone floor and decorative Chettinad motifs, aligning with Vastu principles for auspicious entry. Includes reception area.
Spacious living room with traditional Chettinad elements like carved wooden panels and intricate jali work, large windows facing east to capture morning light as per Vastu norms.
An elegant dining area with an open-plan layout adjacent to the living room. Decorative chandeliers and built-in storage are incorporated.
Modern yet traditional kitchen design combining high-end appliances with artisanal stone countertops, well-connected to the dining area.
Large open space that serves as a combined home office and family entertainment zone. Features flexible furniture arrangements and ample natural light from multiple windows.

openings.details: Double door with decorative metalwork, ensuring good Vastu flow for incoming energy.
Larger east-facing windows to invite morning sunlight and positive chi, enhancing overall wellness.
Balconies with greenery integration connecting the interior with the lush garden exterior.
